theorem nil_merge (ys : List α) : merge [] ys le = ys := by simp [merge]
@[simp] theorem merge_right (xs : List α) : merge xs [] le = xs := by
  induction xs with
  | nil => simp [merge]
  | cons x xs ih => simp [merge, ih]
def MergeSort.Internal.splitInTwo (l : { l : List α // l.length = n }
